Name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2019
About the game: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2019 puts you in control of your favorite pro football franchise. You make the calls as you build your dynasty â€“ build your roster through trades, the draft, and free agency. Analyze the impressive array of data to determine how to put together your own custom playbook and strategies to lead your team to victory. Watch the action unfold in dramatic 2D fashion where you can take control of the play calling and watch your calls play out in front of you. Play by yourself against a challenging AI or join an online multiplayer league and see if you have what it takes to outmanage your fellow gamers.
